text: Alberton-Bloomfield is a provincial electoral district for the Legislative Assembly of Prince Edward Island, Canada. The district was contested for the first time in the 2019 Prince Edward Island general election. ==Members== The riding has elected the following Members of the Legislative Assembly: {| class="wikitable" align=centre !colspan=5|Members of the Legislative Assembly for Alberton-Bloomfield |- !Assembly !Years !colspan="2"|Member !Party |- |66th |2019–present || |Ernie Hudson |Progressive Conservative |} ==Election results== ==References== Category:Prince Edward Island provincial electoral districts
title: Alberton-Bloomfield
